items.content_html: ConnectNow is a lightweight video conferencing platform for seamless virtual meetings. Features include real-time audio/video calls, screen sharing, and chat. Built with modern web technologies for desktop and mobile. Enhance your remote collaboration with ease.

items.content_html: The application utilises various image processing techniques such as object detection, image classification, and image captioning. We have used Mobilenetv3 for image classification because it is efficient and lightweight and good for scalability and low latency
